comments.body: How can users add their custom filters? Is there a way to make this type extensible?

As I understand the code, `'CustomFilter'` is the way to add a [custom filter](https://github.com/AllenFang/react-bootstrap-table/blob/80bad67aa31a1471e3ffa06b9a98baa4382c086f/src/Const.js#L28-L35).

Hmm, but maybe the `FilterType` should be a `string`. The documentation seems to suggest that any string is allowed here.

OTOH, the nice thing about declaring `FilterType` is that a good editor/IDE gives you code completion. If someone wants to use a custom filter, they could use

``` typescript
{
     filter: 'MyCustomFilter' as FilterType
}
```

Which would keep the type checking and the code completion while making it explicit that you are using a custom filter...
Ah thanks. I agree with your interpretation of the code. Also good idea on how to extend the type.
